price: Doğu da Allah’ındır batı da; ne tarafa yönelirseniz yönelin Allah’ın yüzü oradadır. Şüphesiz Allah her şeyi kuşatandır, bilendir.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقُ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبُۚ فَأَيۡنَمَا تُوَلُّواْ فَثَمَّ وَجۡهُ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walillahi al-mashriqu wal-maghribu fa-aynamā tuwallū fathamma wajhu al-lahi inna al-laha wāsiʿun ʿalīmun
